001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
004import javax.annotation.Nullable;
005
006
007/**
008 * Defines a class of exceptions which can be encountered when interacting with persistence tools, including internal
009 * (built-in) data adapters.
010 */
011@SuppressWarnings("unused")
012public abstract class PersistenceException extends RuntimeException {
013  /**
014   * Create a persistence exception with a string message.
015   *
016   * @param message Error message.
017   */
018  PersistenceException(@Nonnull String message) {
019    super(message);
020  }
021
022  /**
023   * Create a persistence exception with a throwable as a cause.
024   *
025   * @param cause Cause for the error.
026   */
027  PersistenceException(@Nonnull Throwable cause) {
028    super(cause);
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Create a persistence exception with a throwable cause and an explicit error message.
033   *
034   * @param message Error message.
035   * @param cause Cause for the error.
036   */
037  PersistenceException(@Nonnull String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
038    super(message, cause);
039  }
040}
